articles.title: Avian influenza spreads throughout Europe and Asia - The Poultry Site
articles.description: The World Organisation for Animal Health (OIE) has received several reports of highly pathogenic avian influenza spread throughout countries in Europe and Asia.
articles.content: The poultry industry is on high alert following outbreaks in South Korea, Japan, Norway, Germany, The Netherlands, Belgium and France. The outbreaks have led to the culling of tens of millions of bir… [+883 chars]

articles.title: Bird flu spreads in Europe and Asia - Reuters
articles.description: Several outbreaks of severe bird flu in Europe and Asia have been reported in recent days to the World Organisation for Animal Health (OIE), in a sign the virus is spreading quickly again.
articles.content: Officials in protective suits head to a poultry farm for a suspected bird flu case in Higashikagawa, western Japan, in this photo taken by Kyodo November 8, 2020. Mandatory credit Kyodo/via REUTERSPA… [+1877 chars]

articles.title: Covid-19: Austria orders nationwide lockdown for unvaccinated - RNZ
articles.description: Austria is placing about 2 million unvaccinated people in lockdown amid record infection levels as Europe's Covid-19 surge grows.
articles.content:
